â„¹ï¸:

  • With the included 128GB Class 10 MicroSD card and card reader, youll have plenty of room for your projects. The 4K HDMI cable is of high quality will ensure you have a great connection to your monitor or TV,and provides a clear, stable picture.
  • The Raspberry Pi 4B is a powerful single board computer with a 1.5GHz 64-bit quad-core CPU, 8GB RAM, and dual-display support at resolutions up to 4K. It also offers Gigabit Ethernet, USB 3.0, and PoE capability (requires separate PoE HAT). With the included Raspberry Pi 4B case, you can protect your Raspberry Pi 4B from dust and scratches. The 40mm PWM fan and 4pcs aluminum heatsinks efficiently dissipate heat and keep your Raspberry Pi 4B cool.
  • This GeeekPi Raspberry Pi 4 8GB Starter Kit is a great way to get started with the Raspberry Pi 4. With all the components you need to get up and running, youll be able to create your own projects in no time. Get yours today and get started on your next project!
  • The 18W 5V 3.6A USB C Power Supply is designed to provide reliable power to your Raspberry Pi 4B. It features multiple protection functions such as over voltage, under voltage, over temperature, over current, and short circuit protection. The power supply also has a convenient ON/OFF switch, so you can easily power on and off your Raspberry Pi 4B.
  • How to configure fan in Raspberry Pi OS: https://wiki.52pi.com/index.php?title=F-0011#How_to_configure_fan_in_Raspberry_Pi_OS
  • The GeeekPi Raspberry Pi 4 8GB Starter Kit is ideal for anyone looking to get started with the Raspberry Pi 4B. This kit includes the powerful Raspberry Pi 4B with 1.5GHz 64-bit quad-core CPU (8GB RAM), an exclusive Raspberry Pi 4B case with a 40mm PWM fan and 4pcs aluminum heatsinks for good heat dissipation, a 5V 3.6A USB C Power Supply with ON/OFF switch and multiple protection functions, a 128GB Class 10 MicroSD card with card reader, and two 4K HDMI cables. for 4GB version, please refer to ASIN: B0BJ278V6W
